revised_title: Biosynthesis of Sterols and Related Compounds in Plants
tldr: This article discusses the biosynthesis of sterols and related compounds in plants, focusing on the role of water-soluble sterols. The authors present evidence that water-soluble sterols have a structural specificity and may play a significant role in plant metabolism. They also highlight the need to include water-soluble sterols in future studies to better understand the role of sterols in plants.
